Package algorithmes

This package gathers all the algorithms an agent can ask for.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Selectionneur All we ask an algorithm to be able to do is : Extract an action chosen among the list of possible moves Learn from its experience
 

Class Summary
AbstractSelectionneurQLambda Common settings and behaviors of Q(lambda) algorithms Sutton and Barto chap 7.6 page 182
Concrete implementations are following Watkin's or Peng's definitions.
Gagnant A player which plays to win : If there is an action that leads to victory : Play it !
SelectionneurAleatoire A minimal opponent to compare with all the other algorithms
SelectionneurHumain A Generic (i.e. available for any problem) Human Player.
SelectionneurMemoire The base of all Q-Learning-like algorithms : Provides a structure to memorize or compute the Q(s,a) Contains all the parameters used in the Q-Learning update rules Contains all the parameters used to control convergence
SelectionneurNN A Neural Network is used to 'memorize' the Q(s,a) values.
SelectionneurNNSingle The underlying Neural Network does not memorize the past experiences, and only learns from the last experience.
SelectionneurPeng Peng's implementation of Q(lambda)
Sutton and Barto chap 7.6 page 182
Reference : Peng et Williams 1996
SelectionneurPengNN Algorithm : Peng & Williams Q(s,a) values stored/learnt/computed in a Neural Network
SelectionneurQL The basic Q-Learning algorithm.
SelectionneurQLINT Essai de généralisation de l'implémentation de l'algorithme Compact Q-Learning : toutes les quantités manipulées sont des octets non signés.
SelectionneurTDFA A linear gradient-descent version of Watkins Q(lambda) SeeSutton & Barto p 213 Q-Learning and the erratum for the details.
SelectionneurWatkins Q(lambda), version Watkins
SelectionneurWatkinsNN Watkin's algorithm to manage and compute Q(s,a), but Q(s,a) are learned thanks to a Neural Network.
SelectionneurWatkinsNNSingle Watkin's algorithm to manage and compute Q(s,a), but Q(s,a) are learned thanks to a memoryless Neural Network.
 

Package algorithmes Description

This package gathers all the algorithms an agent can ask for.
